description: From the everyday to the instant get-together, enjoy the moment with LAY’S Classic potato chips. Deliciously fresh-tasting and crispy, they have been a family favorite snack for nearly 75 years. These big bags are great for sharing some delicious fun at home. • Convenient take-home bag • Three simple ingredients: potatoes, natural oil & salt • Gluten free
name: Lay's Potato Chips, Classic, 10 Ounce
